Reviews.Title: taho
Reviews.Author: hilda
Reviews.Content: great phone, not a "smart" phone, but it does everything I need it to do!battery life is goodfast shipping, got here way earlier than expectedgood price

Reviews.Title: Worst Phone Ever!
Reviews.Author: Cannington De Ness "Ness"
Reviews.Content: Well possibly not, but horrible reception, poor sound quality at best, THE STUPID VOICE COMMAND ACTIVATES CONSTANTLY WITH NO WAY TO TURN OFF!!! It has caused so many issues in meeting with it's loud "Say a command." prompt. It allows a good amount of alarms, but it a tad limited in day options. It is a rugged phone, but only in the sense that it is so bad to begin with you will never noticed if it is damaged in the work place. Oh and the face plate over the lcd screen cracked.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my husband.
Reviews.Author: J. Rollins
Reviews.Content: My husband wanted a basic phone with large numbers for talking and texting! He has told me countless times how much he loves this phone.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!!  :)
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: This is an EXCELLENT product and I would recommend it to any one shopping for anything close to it. Check at Amazon first!  :)

Reviews.Title: Great Phone for a Great Price.
Reviews.Author: Ramon Tinio
Reviews.Content: Needed a replacement phone for an old, damaged Sprint phone.  Happy with this replacement and looking forward to using it for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Great used phone
Reviews.Author: IYAAYAS
Reviews.Content: Was quite dirty when I received it; alittle soap and water (it is waterproof) and over look the scratches and it's great.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, seller as promised
Reviews.Author: Amy Mcdonald
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice flip phone.  It was bought to replace my husband's 7-year old Razr.  It is a solid phone with features very similar to the Razr.  It took me about 5 minutes to 'swap' the phone; activate it and install the updates!  Unlike other posted reviews, the phone came "new" and unlocked without any hassles!The seller was true to the promise of a new phone and the delivery was very fast!!!  All-in-all, the phone and the seller have met our needs!  I AM IMPRESSED!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Diane  B.
Reviews.Content: I bought this flip phone for my husband and he loves it! He wanted a phone that was easy to use and this is.

Reviews.Title: Solid phone
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy here but for a flip phone the specs are pretty good.Its well made and made to be abused. Trust me on this. A family member of mine went through several phones and this one has lasted much longer.

Reviews.Title: it does work but not great
Reviews.Author: Ren
Reviews.Content: the item is as described when it comes to cosmetic flaws or lack of however the disappointed came when we had the phone activated and the buttons are hard to push with slow response.this is frustrating since the phone is used for mostly texting not calling.

Reviews.Title: seems to be a very solid phone
Reviews.Author: eudora
Reviews.Content: It arrived quickly. Has a few nicks/scratches, but it is, after all, a used phone; not bad. Still haven't initialized it, though.This is an updated review: very sturdy, works perfectly. Would purchase from this vendor again.

ProductInfo.Features:
Bluetooth Enabled
GPS
Internet Browser
Music Player
Speakerphone
ProductInfo.Name: Sanyo Taho Rugged 3G 2MP Cell Phone Black Sprint NEW
